title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.62 - Conduct
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.62 - Conduct

State Regulations
(a) Individuals
appearing before the Board must comply with the Board's rules, any other
applicable rules, and all orders and directions of the Board or the designated
hearing officer. (b) Attorneys and
representatives appearing before the Board must be familiar with the Board's
rules, and follow all applicable rules of professional conduct. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.62

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
